component.name: Gifcurry
component.summary: The open-source, Haskell-built video editor for GIF makers

description.p: Gifcurry is the open-source, Haskell-built video editor for GIF makers. Import a video, trim, crop, add text, pick a font, set the size, enable dithering, import subtitles, and save your creation as either a GIF or a video. Making GIFs with Gifcurry is fun!
